name: privacy.sexy
description: Enforce privacy & security best-practices on Windows, macOS and Linux, because privacy is sexy.
author: undergroundwires

scripts.test:cy:run: start-server-and-test "vite build && vite preview --port 7070" http://localhost:7070 "cypress run --config baseUrl=http://localhost:7070"
scripts.lint: npm run lint:md && npm run lint:md:consistency && npm run lint:md:relative-urls && npm run lint:md:external-urls && npm run lint:eslint && npm run lint:yaml && npm run lint:pylint

//devDependencies.@typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin: Cannot migrate to v7 because of `@vue/eslint-config-airbnb-with-typescript`, see https://github.com/vuejs/eslint-config-airbnb/issues/63
//devDependencies.@typescript-eslint/parser: Cannot migrate to v7 because of `@vue/eslint-config-airbnb-with-typescript`, see https://github.com/vuejs/eslint-config-airbnb/issues/63
//devDependencies.@vue/eslint-config-typescript: Cannot migrate to v13 because of `@vue/eslint-config-airbnb-with-typescript`, see https://github.com/vuejs/eslint-config-airbnb/issues/63
//devDependencies.eslint: Cannot migrate to v9 `@typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin` (≤ v7), `@typescript-eslint/parser` (≤ v7), `@vue/eslint-config-airbnb-with-typescript@` (≤ v8) requires `eslint` ≤ v8, see https://github.com/vuejs/eslint-config-airbnb/issues/65, https://github.com/typescript-eslint/typescript-eslint/issues/8211
//devDependencies.eslint-plugin-cypress: Cannot migrate to v4 because it requires eslint (≤ v9)
//devDependencies.vite: Cannot migrate to v6 due to `@modyfi/vite-plugin-yaml` not supporting it yet

//optionalDependencies.dmg-license: Required by `electron-builder` for DMG builds on macOS, https://github.com/electron-userland/electron-builder/issues/6489, https://github.com/electron-userland/electron-builder/issues/6520
